oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Name, etc., of a Bushman at the Amsterdam Battery, in 1879 (L VII.-1. 6046g). Words. Given by Xu gwai (L VII.-1. 6046g-6046j). Also known as Jantje George. 1) This story is found in Book VII-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Amsterdam Battery, near Cape Town: July 15/79
